item.title: Mergers and acquisitions in the early stages are decelerating in Southeast Asia and Korea
item.description: Announcements for early-stage mergers and acquisitions (M&A) in Q4 2016 are predicted to be similar to the same period last year. This is attributed to reduced early-stage M&A activity in Southeast Asia and South Korea, as per the latest Intralinks Deal Flow Predictor (DFP) report released by Intralinks Holdings. Intralinks provides software and services, including virtual data rooms (VDRs), for managing M&A transactions. Southeast Asia, encompassing Singapore, Malaysia, and Indonesia, is experiencing a significant 47.

item.title: The practice of recruiting and retaining skilled individuals
item.description: Innovative talent acquisition strategies are helping some companies secure the best possible candidates. Mei-lynn Chan, Head of Organizational Development, Group Human Capital at Maybank, emphasizes the need for HR departments to approach hiring from a business perspective. This involves quantifying HR activities into tangible business metrics. She argues that while budget constraints may have traditionally limited HR’s hiring choices, a new perspective allows for hiring the right talent if the business can absorb the cost until the hire generates a return on investment.

item.title: The skills you possess will be valuable in securing future employment opportunities
item.description: Legrand illustrates how LinkedIn is innovating by connecting existing skills with the needs of emerging jobs. Olivier Legrand, Managing Director for Asia Pacific at LinkedIn, suggests that many individuals already possess some qualifications for in-demand jobs without realizing it. During his keynote, “Job titles are out, skill sets are in,” at the Singapore Computer Society’s Tech3 Forum, Legrand stated that LinkedIn aims to connect its members not only with employers but also with suitable companies, relevant jobs, and essential skills for future career prospects.

item.title: Word Lens assists travelers in translating signs instantly
item.description: Quest Visual, the company behind the augmented reality app Word Lens, has decided to offer the app and all of its language packs for free for a limited time. This includes languages like English, French, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian. This gesture of thanks to their users comes as the company transitions to new ownership under Google. Source: Word Lens page on Play Store. You can download the Glass, Android, and iOS versions of Word Lens from the Quest Visual website.

item.title: The average increase in deal values due to M&A deal leaks is US$21 million
item.description: A new study by Intralinks and Cass Business School revealed that confidential information leaks about mergers and acquisitions (M&A) before an official announcement added an average of US$21 million to the value of disclosed deals in 2016. The report found that 8.6% of global M&A deals experienced leaks in 2016, a figure consistent with 2015 and exceeding the six-year low of 6% observed in 2014. Despite efforts by financial regulators to limit deal leaks through regulations and enforcement actions, the trend of leaked deals has seen an increase in 2015 and 2016.
